title: What can I do with my CS degree in the music industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A Write modules for production software, develop custom software for musicians who aren’t being served by the current offerings, maybe work for a music company. If you just want to be involved but don’t want a full time job, or just want to see what’s involved in computers & music, I’d recommend participating in an open-source music project.
